summary:
In the course of nearly 40 years of professional experience, I have worked in different areas of health care, national as well as international:
Health Consultant and fundraiser for Trumpeter Community Health, a Faith-based orga- nisation, implementing Water and Sanitation for selected areas in Juba, South Sudan. Registered self-empowered nurse in different positions in the Netherlands.
Health Advisor for HealthnetTPO by implementation of Basic Health Services for 8 primary health care clinics and their communities in South Sudan, Northern and Western Bahr el Ghazal State under BUZA funding.
Reproductive Health Coordinator in emergencies for CORDAID (Catholic Organization for Relief and Development-AID) Sudan (South Darfur) to provide capacity building and trai- ning for national health workers by implementation of MISP (Minimum Initial Service Package) for Reproductive Health for re-opening of 13 primary health care clinics and 2 hospitals with sustaining operations for health system supports for refugees and host po- pulations under European Union funding.
Reproductive Health Coordinator in emergencies for ZOA (Zuid Oost Azie) Vluchtelingen- zorg provides capacity building and training for national health workers in northern Afghanistan, Sozma Qala District for implementation the Basic Package of Health Services. Registered Nurse ministering in the Netherlands on different contracts: in (Teaching) Hospital as well as Primary Health Care.
Objective: to lead a non-profit organisation ministering to dimensions of community and health service provision; expressing vision; enthusiasm; contextualised sense; proven management skills; commitment to excellent and quality Health service and care.
